title: Hello I`m Ali!
subtitle: Expreinced Android developer | new learner of Front-end development

items.content: Experienced Android developer with +5 years of experience in developing, testing and maintaining large scale applications in the field of E-commerce, Social Media, Video-on-demand and Map based applications with 4.3 stars rating in Google Play and +20M users. Using Kotlin, Java, Android SDK, SQL, GitFlow, Custom Views, Jetpack components and third party libraries to build memory efficient, elegant UI/UX design and well-performing applications according to the SOLID principles with clean code and appropriate documentation.
